problem_text_cn: 如图所示,AB∥CD,点E在CB的延长线上．若∠ABE=70°,则∠ECD的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB ∥ CD, point E is on the extended line of CB. If ∠ABE = N_0, then the degree of ∠ECD is ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:根据邻补角的性质可得∠ABC的度数,再根据两直线平行内错角相等可得答案:∵∠ABE=70°,∴∠ABC=180°-70°=110°∵AB//CD,∴∠ECD=∠ABC=110°.故选D.
